Title: "In The Shadows of Diplomacy"

On an earnest parchment of peace and pain,
An accusation, like a rusted chain.
In Zurich's quiet, a summons pines,
Yet a behemoth devours, stifles signs.
Ukrainian voice in Asian aisles,
Sea-salted winds over a thousand miles.
A plea cast to the guardians of dawn,
Resilience - our world wears like a worn.
